projects.title: Projects
projects.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this project?

chat.placeholder: Describe what you want to build...
chat.placeholderDisabled: Create or select a project to start.
chat.critiqueTooltip: Get AI Feedback on Design & Accessibility
chat.errorMessage: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try again.
chat.critiqueError: Sorry, an error occurred while generating the critique.
chat.initialMessage:
Welcome to 'I am an Engineer'

Your smart platform for building websites. Describe your idea, and we'll build your site.
No programming experience needed. Here, your ideas become reality.

Describe the site you imagine, whether it's an e-commerce store with modern designs and animations, a personal blog, or a corporate website. 'I am an Engineer' understands your vision and handles the rest.

Try asking for something like:
"I want a modern fashion e-commerce store with elegant animations on product browsing."

Start now, and let digital engineering build your dream website.

projectChat.noMessages: No messages yet. Start the conversation!

auth.emptyFields: Email and password cannot be empty.

collaboration.title: Share "{projectName}"
collaboration.description: Invite others to collaborate on this project in real-time.
collaboration.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this collaborator?

developerIntro.messageFromDeveloper: A Message from the Platform Developer
developerIntro.para1: Abdulrahman Sultan Al-Darb, a fourth-level student at Al-Qalam University, is passionate about the world of technology and software development. He is known for his love of innovation and finding smart solutions that make programmers' lives easier.
developerIntro.para2: He developed this platform in a unique and simplified way to help developers create web applications with ease. By simply entering the project idea, the system generates the complete application to its final stages, without needing to deal with complex programming details.
developerIntro.para3: Through this work, Abdulrahman aims to empower developers and creators to turn their ideas into practical reality quickly and efficiently, making web development an enjoyable and easy experience for everyone.

publish.allowDownloadDescription: Permit users to download the project's source code as a .zip file.
publish.cloningFilesAndChat: Allow cloning files and chat history
publish.statusApproved: Your project is live in the marketplace!
publish.statusRejected: Your previous submission was not approved. You can make changes and submit again.
